$(A \cup B)' = A' \cap B'$

$(A \cap B)' = A' \cup B'$

$P(A) = 1 - P(A')$

$P(A \cup B) = P(A) + P(B) - P(A \cap B)$

$_nP_r =\frac{n!}{(n-r)!}$

$_nC_r = \frac{_nP_r}{r!} = \frac{n!}{(n - r)!r!}$

$\binom{n}{n_1 \ \ n_2 \ \cdots \ \ n_k} = \frac{n!}{n_1! n_2! \cdots n_k!}$

$P(B | A) = \frac{P(A \cap B)}{P(A)}$

$P(B'|A) = 1 - P(B|A)$

Bayes Rule: $P(A|B) = \frac{P(B|A)P(A)}{P(B)}$

$\mu = E(Y) = \sum_{y \in \mathbb{S}}yp(y)$

$\sigma^2 = V(Y) = \sum_{y \in \mathbb{S}}(y - \mu)^2p(y)$
\
\
**Discrete Uniform distribution:**

$$p(y) = \frac{1}{m}\ \ \ y = 1, 2, \dots, m,$$

$$F(y) = P(Y \leq y) = \begin{cases}
0, & y < 1,\\
\frac{k}{m} & k \leq y < k+1,\\
1, & m \leq y.
\end{cases}$$
